page1text: Magic asks for a lot of imagination. It is not just waving around a wand and blurting out odd words. It requires a mind, set to believe things he might never see, energy he may feel or foul with negative thoughts.
page2intro: Beware,for the arcane in you might manifest wrongly.
page2text: So focus, stay on the path you feel is righteous, and take it with a little wit, for serious mages never have gained the knowledge that connects nature with the arcane !
page3text: On your journey troughout the world to study the arcane, you will most likely encounter dangerous foes. There are three nifty basic spells that can aid you in preventing early death.
page4text: Calling forth a small combustion, propulsing a stream of hot air towards your foe.
page4text2: Stay steady, articulate well, and give a little left-flick with your wand to keep your enemy at bay.
page5text: Call forth a stream of red arcane dust that disarms your foe.
page5text2: Stay steady, articulate well, and left-flick with your wand when ready to disarm your foe.
page6text2: An upward slash from bottom left to top right while, in one sigh, orate the spell. This should conjure blue spheres that absorb incoming damage.
page7text: May you have harmed a friend or yourself while messing around with our basic survival spell, remember then that there is always aid to be given for small wounds and barely broken bones.
page8text: Heals the targetted living person or creature.
page8text2: Articulate clearely, stay close to wounded subject,and give a soft swish.\n\nImportant : do not be hasty, you might end up hurting your ally.
page9text: The art of making oneself rich. This branch of magic should be only used when needed, because greed has never led to any good... you might be swimming in gold, but there are places where nothing can be bought !
page10text2: Breath softly, speak the named spell, and strike softly over the ore with a slow, right-flick.
page12text: Wizards and mages get about in lots of ways. Brooms, Chimneys, Teleportation, ... In this book however, I will teach you how to bewitch Carpet to make it hover in the air.
page13text: Place down 2 pieces of carpet, Speak the spell, and strike your wand soflty over the top of your rug. Once up, mount it, go forward, and look anywhere you want to go !
